text: Leslie Royston "Les" Johnson AM (2 November 1924 - 26 May 2015) was a former Australian politician and minister. He served as a member of the Australian Parliament representing Hughes serving from 1955 through 1966 and again from 1969 through 1983. Johnson was made a Member of the Order of Australia (AM) in June 1990. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Australian politicians
title: Les Johnson
